verbs.description: [ARG0: sound tigers] [V: enjoy] [ARG1: rare three - minute shift in offensive zone] he does n't want to overextend his stay on the ice but to start the third period of sunday bridgeport sound tigers game against lehigh valley tanner fritz got caught out there awhile i do n't think the staff likes it that much fritz said thursday after practice at the wonderland of ice i came back they were like you were out there for three minutes i was like oh boy this time it could n't be helped after steve bernier backcheck helped force a turnover the sound tigers chris bourque crossed the phantoms blue line with the puck 21 seconds into the period taylor leier lehigh valley clayton keller philippe myers mitch vande sompel german rubtsov zach palmquist phil varone chris bourque joey anderson brent thompson kieffer bellows sebastian aho mike sislo parker wotherspoon tigers phantoms devon toews carter hart bridgeport sound tigers bridgeport connecticut kyle burroughs steve bernier bridgeport colin mcdonald ushl tanner fritz ryan hitchcock three - minute sound tigers
